a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Human Development Index vs. Corruption Perception Index, 2018
The vertical axis shows scores in the UN Human Development Index (lower values reflect lower development). The
horizontal axis shows scores in Transparency International's Corruption Perception Index (lower values reflect higher
Data source: UNDP, Human Development Report(2021-22); Transparency International (2018)
